channel.title: matching function on Pascal Michaillat
channel.description: Recent content in matching function on Pascal Michaillat

item.title: Unemployment
item.description: This course presents a matching model of unemployment and uses it to study unemployment fluctuations, job rationing, and labor market policies.

item.title: Economic Slack
item.description: This graduate course presents matching models of economic slack and uses them to study business-cycle fluctuations, monetary policy, and fiscal policy.
